overview: Summer 2010. The entire central part of Russia is engulfed in fires. The authors of the films of the almanac together with the volunteers go to the epicenter of events. Volunteers, foresters, firefighters – they are not heroes in the usual sense of the word, it was just their life, their trouble, and they tried to cope with it as best they could.

production_companies.name: M. Razbezhkina and M. Ugarov Academy

title: Portmanteau Film Dedicated to the Fires of Summer 2010
